title: Unusual Login Issue
body:
Today I don't have access to my usual connection, therefore I have been using a tethered connection through my mobile phone.
This works great, I have relatively good ping, bandwidth and no packet loss or anything.
As far as I'm aware, my connection is just great. The one thing that refuses to work is LoL.

I can open the patcher fine, and get to the log-in screen. But once I try and log on, I get an extremely slow server authentication message, then after a couple minutes of "logging on" it stops and tells me there is a connection error.

Anyone have any idea as to what the problem is/a likely method to fix it?

Also, why don't we have a tech board yet? Seems like a pretty logical thing to add.

Thanks

Edit: Currently I've been "logging on' for 10mins...     Hmm....
